price: Monwura Amanehunu gya no apono no mu nkͻtena hͻ. Efie bͻne paa ne wͻn a wͻyε ahomasoͻ no fie.
arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
